data.selected_title: ひとりかくれんぼ (One-Man Hide and Seek)

selected_metadata.overview: ぬいぐるみを使った降霊術の儀式。深夜、風呂場、テレビの砂嵐。ルールを破った瞬間に画面が歪み、背後に『それ』が現れるまでをPOV（一人称視点）で描く。
selected_metadata.horror_point: 『自分の家』という安全圏が、簡単な儀式で呪いの場に変貌するという没入感。海外の『Creepypasta』ファンにも通じる儀式型ホラーの様式美。

data.title_en: WARNING: The Forbidden Ritual of Hitori Kakurenbo
data.title_jp: 【閲覧注意】ひとりかくれんぼ：絶対にやってはいけない禁忌の儀式
data.description: Have you ever heard of the Japanese urban legend Hitori Kakurenbo? This ritual is not a game. It is a way to invite a wandering spirit into a doll. Many have tried, and many have disappeared. The rules are simple but breaking them leads to a fate worse than death. Do you believe in the supernatural? Tell us your scariest experience in the comments below. This Japanese Horror experience explores the dark side of urban legends and creepy rituals. Experience the terror of the forbidden ceremony right in your own home through this POV journey. Keywords: Japanese Horror, Urban Legend, Creepy, Supernatural, Hitori Kakurenbo, Ritual.
data.editorial_notes:
3人のエキスパートによるプロトコル：
1. Viral Architectのタイトル案: 
   A) NEVER Play Hide and Seek Alone: The Warning
   B) WARNING: The Forbidden Ritual of Hitori Kakurenbo
   C) I Summoned Something in My Bathroom #Shorts
選定理由: 案Bを採用。冒頭に強烈な『WARNING』を配置し、世界的に有名な『Hitori Kakurenbo』の名を入れることで、検索流入とスクロール停止率（Hook Rate）を最大化します。

2. 演出指示: POV（一人称視点）を徹底。Vrew台本は句読点を排除し、不気味なリズム感を重視。映像はMidjourneyで「35mm」「grainy film」を指定し、90年代Jホラーの湿った質感を再現します。後半にかけてTVの砂嵐の光と闇のコントラストを強め、心理的圧迫感を高めます。
data.vrew_script:
Three AM is the hour of the dead
Replace the stuffing with rice and fingernails
Give the doll a name but never your own
Stabbing it means the game has officially begun
Hide in the bathtub and turn off every light
The static on the TV is your only friend
Listen for the sound of dragging footsteps
If you hear it whisper your name do not move
It is holding the knife you left behind
Never let the salt water spill from your mouth
Because if it finds you the ritual never ends
